name: GetSharedAppItem
description:
Retrieve details of an app item using a shared link.

Use this tool to get information about an app item by providing a shared link, which may originate from any enterprise.

parameters.name: shared_link_information
parameters.description: A string with the format `shared_link=[link]&shared_link_password=[password]`, containing the shared link and an optional password.

value_schema.description:
A header containing the shared link and optional password for the
shared link.

The format for this header is `shared_link=[link]&shared_link_password=[password]`.
